Docs.summary: Represents options can be set during the creation of a event hub receiver.

Docs.summary: Returns the position for the end of a stream. Provide this position in receiver creation to start receiving from the next available event in the partition after the receiver is created.

Docs.summary: Gets the sequence number of the event at the position. It can be null if the position is just created from an offset or an enqueued time.
